statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Boardingham scores 14 as Southern Miss cruises past Coppin State 88-74
article.headline: Boardingham scores 14 as Southern Miss cruises past Coppin State 88-74
article.linkText: Boardingham scores 14 as Southern Miss cruises past Coppin State 88-74
article.story: ROAD TOWN, British Virgin Islands -- Daveon Boardingham scored 14 points to lead four players in double digits as Southern Mississippi cruised past Coppin State 88-74 in the final game of the BVI Tropical Shootout on Friday night. Jerrold Brooks had 13 points with three rebounds and six assists. Michael Craig scored 12 points and led the team with seven rebounds. Neil Watson chipped in with 11 points and eight assists. The Golden Eagles (10-2) hit 59.3 percent from the field overall. Brooks started the scoring for the Golden Eagles with a 3-point jumper less than a minute into the first period. USM led by as many as 20 points with 2:48 left in the first before going into the break with a 50-34 advantage. The Golden Eagles maintained a double-digit lead throughout the second period and cruised to the win. Michael Murray was the team leader for Coppin State (4-6) with 23 points.
